overview: UAKTI - INSTRUMENTAL WORKSHOP is a documentary about the musical group UAKTI, which creates its own instruments from materials such as PVC tubes, glass and gourds, reproducing the sounds of nature in its pure state. The film freely discusses the indigenous legend that gave rise to the group's name, the various influences contained in its work and the process of creating and manufacturing its songs and instruments.
title: Uakti – Oficina Instrumental
